about_the_game:
Warmonger is a Free-to-Play PVP MMO with MOBA-style combat in a persistent world.



Participate, not just in single matches, but in an epic war! Choose between factions and many distinct characters with tons of different weapon setups and enjoy truly spectacular and tactically challenging combat with and against other players or NPCs.

Features:

• Nations fight for glory and wealth

• MOBA-style combat to conquer territories in a persistent world

• Massive arsenal of weapons with unique skills

• Expand your territories to gain resources

• Defend and upgrade your fortress

• Political system with king elections
detailed_description:

Features:

name: Warmonger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer with IE 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2,0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A graphic card thats supports at least DirectX 10 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer with IE 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2,4 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A graphic card thats supports at least DirectX 10 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Warmonger is a Free-to-Play PVP MMO with MOBA-style combat in a persistent world. Choose between different factions and many distinct characters with tons of different weapon setups. It's not just a match: It’s WAR!
supported_languages: English, Italian, German, Turkish, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal
